code: export var ADD_TODO="ADD_TODO";export var REMOVE_TODO="REMOVE_TODO";export var TOGGLE_TODO="TOGGLE_TODO";export var addTodo=function addTodo(todo){return{type:"ADD_TODO",todo:todo};};export var removeTodo=function removeTodo(id){return{type:"REMOVE_TODO",id:id};};export var toggleTodo=function toggleTodo(id){return{type:"TOGGLE_TODO",id:id};};
